name: Bump+Smack
description: Bump+Smack is an exciting casual game where you bump balls and smack the table to get the highest score. Keep the balls from falling below your board and bump them back up to the goals. Smack the table to give that extra "oomph" to get your balls into the goal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel 4th Generation Processor or Higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D Acceleration Required w/ 512MB VRAM and DirectX 11 support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1100 MB available space Sound Card: Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit or higher Processor: Intel 4th Generation Processor or Higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1100 MB available space Sound Card: Required
